html.title: HTML справочник на React
html.description: Интерактивная справка HTML тегов на React/Redux. Фильтрация, поиск, движущиеся меню с указателем. Проект готовился 5 дней с использованием платформы create-react-app.

pizza.title: Application 'Pizzeria'
pizza.description: Educational project on Angular2 (angular-cli). On the website implemented online store of pizzas, compiling from ingredients and adding to basket. All data saving in localStorage.

resume.title: Interactive Resume
resume.description: Application on Angular with language changing feature, viewing work from portfolio on different resolutions. Work created on Webpack bundler, responsive design.

value.title: Value Garden Supply'
value.description: Crossbrowser markup of webpage by JPG layout. Responsive on my own opinion.

naturetour.title: Nature Tour'
naturetour.description: Crossbrowser markup of webpage by PSD layout with implementation of slider on JavaScript. Responsive on my own opinion. Preprocessor LESS used.

jokerbros.title: Game Room'
jokerbros.description: Project on DB MySQL randomly choose winner from visitors, who get all bits of participants of the game. DB filters of game rooms, debit of losers and adding of new game rooms.

weather.title: Weather forecast from Yahoo
weather.description: Application 'Yahoo weather forecast' of all cities of the world. Used Yahoo Weather Api and different React plugins. Forecast on a week with graph of temperatures.
